name: ContentDocumentLink
description: Represents the link between a Salesforce CRM Content document or Salesforce file and where it's shared.
summary: The object {ContentDocumentLink} in the Salesforce application is used to link content documents to various entities. It has attributes such as Id, LinkedEntityId, ContentDocumentId, IsDeleted, SystemModstamp, ShareType, and Visibility.{id: id, LinkedEntityId: reference, ContentDocumentId: reference, IsDeleted: boolean, SystemModstamp: datetime, ShareType: picklist, Visibility: picklist}
label: Content Document Link
